docs: Fetches the OpenRouter model catalog (/api/v1/models) and returns filtered, compact results. No API key required for the catalog endpoint. Supports filtering by: text search, required capabilities (tools, reasoning, vision, audio, structured output), price ceiling, minimum context length, and modality. Returns only the fields needed for model selection, keeping token usage low.
